name: Xmas Elf
description:
Xmas Elf

Child-friendly game

Help a little elf prepare Christmas gifts! Collect the gifts displayed on the left upper corner and sweets for extra points and avoid poop and rocks as they will reduce your score and health points!

I made this game challenging myself to create a complete game. It is my first game to be published anywhere. 

Next goal is to publish it on Google Play Store.

Controls:

A/D or Left/Right Arrows to move

Credits:

Design, graphics and programming — me (https://eugeen.itch.io/)

Contacts:
